name: Scream Tail
flavorText: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokémon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

previous.name: Great Tusk
previous.flavorText: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. The name Great Tusk was taken from a creature listed in a certain book.

next.name: Brute Bonnet
next.flavorText: It is possible that the creature listed as Brute Bonnet in a certain book could actually be this Pokémon.
